about_the_game:
Game Background

Chen Xi is the national goddess of the past, the slender straight legs, exudes the peach fragrance of the palm, soft white body, delicate and beautiful face all let the photographer look at the mouth dry, burning with desire! If it's possible to spend a night with her......

Big Star - Chen Xi and the photographer (you) have such and such stories~

💞Game Features💞

  • Chen Xi - the main female character

  • There are 12 erotic animations in the game levels, and 24 for two types of clothing (both with character animations and close-up animations)

  • Plot performances; in the levels; in the standing picture triggers and in free mode, there are female character voice triggers

  • Free mode props, hands and tongue three kinds of interactions

  • Dual themes of the Spring Festival and Valentine's Day, different atmospheres in the scenes, costumes and CG

  • Exquisite full-motion H scene performances! 18 H-story camera movements + free mode

  • 1,5000 words of text

  • One-click skip (√)

New character status

New trap setting animation

Interactive scenes/items, and animation performances

The character portraits in the levels will have different animation performances in different triggering scenarios, and the actions, expressions and voice tones will be richer, allowing everyone to feel refreshed while playing the game (√)

We have carefully created each scene and each episode, so that everyone in the festive atmosphere of the Chinese New Year and Valentine's Day, to experience the most distinctive romance and sweetness!❤️

content_descriptors.notes:
This work contains only nudity, sex, femdom and other pornographic content. It is not suitable for players of all ages. Please consider carefully before purchasing!
The characters, place names, events, plots, etc. appearing in this work are all fictitious, and all themes, contents, and forms are fictitious creations.
Any similarity is purely coincidental, and the fictional fantasy content contained in the content is for entertainment purposes only.
All characters in this game are 18 years or older.

detailed_description:
Contact Us


About the Game

Game Background

Chen Xi is the national goddess of the past, the slender straight legs, exudes the peach fragrance of the palm, soft white body, delicate and beautiful face all let the photographer look at the mouth dry, burning with desire! If it's possible to spend a night with her......

Big Star - Chen Xi and the photographer (you) have such and such stories~

💞Game Features💞

  • Chen Xi - the main female character

  • There are 12 erotic animations in the game levels, and 24 for two types of clothing (both with character animations and close-up animations)

  • Plot performances; in the levels; in the standing picture triggers and in free mode, there are female character voice triggers

  • Free mode props, hands and tongue three kinds of interactions

  • Dual themes of the Spring Festival and Valentine's Day, different atmospheres in the scenes, costumes and CG

  • Exquisite full-motion H scene performances! 18 H-story camera movements + free mode

  • 1,5000 words of text

  • One-click skip (√)

New character status

New trap setting animation

Interactive scenes/items, and animation performances

The character portraits in the levels will have different animation performances in different triggering scenarios, and the actions, expressions and voice tones will be richer, allowing everyone to feel refreshed while playing the game (√)

We have carefully created each scene and each episode, so that everyone in the festive atmosphere of the Chinese New Year and Valentine's Day, to experience the most distinctive romance and sweetness!❤️
name: YUME 5 : Spring Festival of Lust

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Use the WASD keys to control the modern Chen Xi, and the movement direction is normal; while her previous life character is a mirror image with the opposite movement. Players need to control both at the same time to explore the maze
supported_languages:
English, Russian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
